Header: Troops Clean up Welikanda Township Area
Content: A contingent of more than 200 Army personnel, government officials, businessmen and members of the public joined hands together and cleaned Welikanda township area on Friday (03) during a self-help community ‘Shramadana’ programme, launched by the SFHQ-East. Troops of the Security Force Headquarters - East and 23 Division on the instructions of the Commander, Security Forces - East, Major General Rasika Fernando contributed to the project throughout the day with enthusiasm.
